title: saul_good_man
author: saul_good_man
created_time: October 05, 2022, 08:56:15 AMLast edit: December 23, 2023, 09:51:20 AM by saul_good_man
content: Filter (checking) phone numbers TelegramPrice: 1000 numbers = 1 $*​*Good conditions for cooperation for wholesalers.​FREE TEST! We check ~2-3 million numbers per dayThe result of the work is sent in an Excel spreadsheet.Format: Number TELEGRAM; ID Telegram, Nickname Telegram, Last seen TelegramExample : https://i.imgur.com/epQeNcq.pngTelegram for contact - https://t.me/check_numbersWe accept for payment:  USDT, Bitcoin, All Crypto

comments.author: klien_br
comments.body: Quote from: saul_good_man on October 05, 2022, 08:56:15 AMFilter (checking) phone numbers TelegramPrice: 1000 numbers = 1.4 $*​*Good conditions for cooperation for wholesalers.​We check ~2-3 million numbers per dayThe result of the work is sent in an Excel spreadsheet.Format: Number TELEGRAM; ID Telegram, Nickname Telegram, Last seen TelegramExample : Telegram for contact - https://t.me/check_numbersWe accept for payment:  USDT, Bitcoin, All Crypto Why would anyone need this?

comments.author: saul_good_man
comments.body: [/quote]Why would anyone need this?[/quote]This service is in demand in the market.To check the bases of phone numbers on Telegram accounts.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: saul_good_man on October 05, 2022, 09:04:55 AMThis service is in demand in the market.To check the bases of phone numbers on Telegram accounts.if you can clarify something for me. Do you want to say yes regardless if we create a custom nickname on telegram, you can find our phone number initially used on Telegram registration.Or do you just research and collect users who are not changed their phone numbers into nicknames?

comments.author: saul_good_man
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 05, 2022, 11:02:07 AMQuote from: saul_good_man on October 05, 2022, 09:04:55 AMThis service is in demand in the market.To check the bases of phone numbers on Telegram accounts.if you can clarify something for me. Do you want to say yes regardless if we create a custom nickname on telegram, you can find our phone number initially used on Telegram registration.Or do you just research and collect users who are not changed their phone numbers into nicknames?For example: You have a database of Whatsapp account numbers and you would like to know if any of the Telegram users have an account for these numbers. We are just the same by phone numbers and find Telegram accounts.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 05, 2022, 11:02:07 AMDo you want to say yes regardless if we create a custom nickname on telegram, you can find our phone number initially used on Telegram registration.I don't think that something like that exists, that can do that (well at least I hope it doesn't) because it would be a serious breach of privacy if someone can extract hidden numbers. Then again, since everything can be hacked (including Telegram database) I wouldn't suggest anyone using their real mobile phone number.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: saul_good_man on October 05, 2022, 09:04:55 AMThis service is in demand in the market.To check the bases of phone numbers on Telegram accounts.What do you mean that service is in demand? This service does not seem to be legit and only scammers or hackers may be willing to get this data. What is the use case for this data?Quote from: Rikafip on October 14, 2022, 09:58:58 AMThen again, since everything can be hacked (including Telegram database) I wouldn't suggest anyone using their real mobile phone number.So if we don't use the real phone numbers for our telegram, then which phone number we use    This is making me confused.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 20, 2022, 02:47:16 PMSo if we don't use the real phone numbers for our telegram, then which phone number we use    This is making me confused.What I meant is, don't use your main mobile phone number as you usually have to leave ID info in order to get one (at least that became standard practice in here in EU) and instead use virtual mobile phone number service to create Telegram account if you can't get another sim card without giving your ID. Well, at least that's what I did 6 years ago when I got Telegram for the first time. Trust no one, including Telegram.Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 20, 2022, 02:47:16 PMWhat do you mean that service is in demand? This service does not seem to be legit and only scammers or hackers may be willing to get this data. What is the use case for this data?I could see it being used by marketing agencies, spamming their crap to Telegram as well.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on October 20, 2022, 02:47:16 PM...So if we don't use the real phone numbers for our telegram, then which phone number we use    This is making me confused.We can buy a phone chip just to create a telegram account... That's what they mean with a telegram account without your real phone.If this service is possible that's because people don't have good security practices with their accounts, anyone can go to their privacy settings > Phone number, and hide the number for all as you can see in the next image.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on December 19, 2022, 04:26:26 PMIf this service is possible that's because people don't have good security practices with their accounts, anyone can go to their privacy settings > Phone number, and hide the number for all as you can see in the next image.I don't think OP is collecting the numbers by going everyone's privacy setting. It some kind of data leak and OP got the data from the leak. Years ago I was doing something and it struck me that it's possible to get the numbers. There were some bots which allowed to see phone numbers. That time telegram was fairly new. Since then I never thought of using telegram.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on October 14, 2022, 09:58:58 AMQuote from: examplens on October 05, 2022, 11:02:07 AMDo you want to say yes regardless if we create a custom nickname on telegram, you can find our phone number initially used on Telegram registration.I don't think that something like that exists, that can do that (well at least I hope it doesn't) because it would be a serious breach of privacy if someone can extract hidden numbers. Then again, since everything can be hacked (including Telegram database) I wouldn't suggest anyone using their real mobile phone number.Even though OP didn't get to extract the phone numbers from the owners directly, I think it is a breach of privacy to the owners of these numbers. It might be in high demand in the industry but I don't consider it right. If you are doing this under cybersecurity arm for a fraudulent attack on someone or on a transaction then its ok but if not, then, I don't consider it ideal and should not be patronised as it will breed something more than what it currently is.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: If you want to get your numbers checked on Telegram then "Better Call Saul"

comments.author: mihaybus
comments.body: Guys, did anyone really get it why this service exists and what does it can offer?Because OP is ”bumping" it without explaining anything almost
